name: v3.3.2 [LAST]
body:
**Added:**
`[1]` `-timeout` command to timeout members.
`[2]` `-banner` command to see user's banner if available.
`[3]` Discord time format to moderation logs (temp mutes, temp bans) to know when the punishment expires.

**Changed:**
`[1]` Website rework, make sure to take a look at it yourself <https://dreddbot.xyz> :dab: 
*There's also something cool added, unfortunately not as advanced as I wanted but it's alright.*

**Fixed:**
`[1]` Error where you're unable to execute a command when replying to user's message.

name: v3.2.3
body: Fixes to prevent from getting ratelimited when raids happen

name: v3.2.0
body:
**V3.2.0 Update**

**Added:**
`[1]` `mode247`, the bot will stay in the channel after everyone leaves the channel, however, if there's no activity in the voice channel for 12 hours, it will leave the channel to save up resources. :beta: 
`[2]` `radio`, enqueues the radio station you prefer the most, if you have radio station suggestions, feel free to join the support server and let us know what radios we should add. :beta: 
`[3]` Localized more strings.
`[4]` Apparently there was no way to remove channels and roles from automod's whitelist, not anymore.
`[5]` A badge for translators - :translator:

**Changed/Fixed:**
`[1]` `hackban` not checking if the bot has permissions to ban members
`[2]` Temp unbans sending 1 message per unban instead 1 message per 10 unbans
`[3]` Default music volume to 75%
`[4]` Ability to speed up streams
`[5]` Queue erroring if there's a live stream in the queue
`[6]` Aware timezone bugs (`roleinfo` and `newusers` commands)
`[7]` Disconnect from voice channel message not being deleted after 5 seconds.

**Removed:**
`[1]` Updated member roles logging, to prevent from getting rate-limited (5 messages per 5 seconds in a channel and 50 messages per 10 seconds globally)

*Please note: Where you see the :beta: emoji, it means that the command/functionality is in early beta and require guilds to be whitelisted in order to use the command, if you're unsure if the command is in beta or not, you can check the help of the command (`help mode247`) and if it's in beta it will say so in the description.*

name: v3.1.3
body:
**V3.1.3** Update!

**Added:**
`[1]` Global cooldown, if you hit that cooldown 4 times you get automatically blacklisted (60 commands per 60 seconds)

**Fixed/Changes:**
`[1]` Ability to evade your mutes, sorry it took so long.
`[2]` Some minor typos
`[3]` Markdown will not be escaped for `afk` and `gafk` commands.

name: v3.1.2
body:
**Added:**
`[1]` `bi` alias for `botinfo`
`[2]` :moderator: flag for certified Discord Moderators
`[3]` Vote locked `volume` command

**Fixed/Updated:**
`[1]` Message edit logging errors when
`[2]` Bot responding with its prefix on :reply: reply and :mention: role mention
`[3]` Seek not actually seeking forward from the current position, but from the start instead.
`[4]` Changed the badges to the new blurple

**Removed:**
`[1]` All the commands that were removed in v3.1.1, they will not be responding anymore or be shown in the help menu.

name: v3.1.1
body:
**Added:**
`[1]` `p` alias for `play`
`[2]` `av` alias for `avatar`
`[3]` `remindme` alias for `remind`
`[4]` `setglobalafk` command for you to set your AFK state globally
`[5]` Guild description to `serverinfo` command, if guild has a description set, it'll be displayed in the embed's description.
`[6]` Added/Removed roles log (can be found under member update logging module)
`[7]` Responses to bot mentions

**Fixed/Improved:**
`[1]` Dehoist log being sent twice (I believe I've fixed it, haven't actually tested it out)
`[2]` `cleanup` command will now purge better

**Removed:**
`[1]` Presence intent. The following commands will no longer work/display your status:
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀• `serverinfo`, `userinfo` - Will no longer show your/other's status(es).
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀• `toggle status`, `status`, `serverstaff` - They will respond with a warning that these commands are being removed (didn't take them out in this update, so I wouldn't confuse anyone)

As this removes presence intents, another issue occurs, which I am unable to fix due to Discord's rate limits - booting time, without presence intents the bot takes longer to cache users, thus why, it'll take longer to boot. (This update will be live in 5 minutes, currently rebooting the bot)

name: v3.1.0
body:
**Added:**
`[1]` `todo swap` - will swap your todos.
`[2]` `roleinfo` - will show information about the role
`[3]` `reminder` alias for `remind`
`[4]` `strike` alias for `warn`

**Fixed:**
`[1]` Automod not functioning properly.
`[2]` Logs breaking the markdown if user name contains anything that breaks the markdown
`[3]` Commands that can only be used in guilds erroring silently in DMs
`[4]` :homes: for help command, yes - that finally is working without any bugs!
`[5]` `reaction-roles list` throwing an error if the assigned role is deleted, it'll display None now.
`[6]` `status` command being hidden, not sure why it was hidden
`[7]` Description of certain commands.


**Improved:**
`[1]` Reaction roles should now give roles to members a bit faster (from my testing it's now faster by 0.1-0.2 seconds)
`[2]` `serverinfo` bot ackowledgements, they're not as confusing as they were before
`[3]` `source` command, it will now send a file with code if the source is longer than 2000 characters and shorter than 50000 characters. (It will still send a link to GitHub for mobile users who can't see the file via the file preview feature)

name: v3.0.2
body: Forgot to release this 3 days ago

name: v3.0.1
body:
1. Added support for multiple roles on join
2. Fixed todo lists escaping the markdown
3. Added :homes: reaction to the help command so you could return back to the main page of help command
4. Added/Fixed some other stuff

name: v2.5.8 (version bump)
body: bumping version to v2.5.8 cause technically v3 will be coming out later this year.

name: v1.5.7
body: I keep forgetting to do those

name: v1.5.6
body:
1. `duck` command
2. `prefix` doesn't require to have manage server to view the prefix

I actually forgot to make this release 5 days ago....

name: v1.5.5.1 release
body: didn't fix invite regex finding only discordapp.com invites and not discord.com

name: 1.4.1 release
body: 1. Fixed issue where you couldn't edit your todo if it was shorter than 150 characters.

name: V1.4.0 Release
body:
1. users that don't share servers with a bot will be fetched now.
2. Welcoming and leaving messages now have ability to display user's tag and id
3. Changed how todo list ids are displayed`
4. Updated character limits for todo lists.
5. Fixed logging not logging deleted/edited messages over 1024 characters
6. Moderation commands have a new format
7. Added owner-exclusive features
8. Changed error handler format
